thread.title: Suunto Ambit3 Sport Sapphire Watch
thread.title_full: Suunto Ambit3 Sport Sapphire Watch - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Jill K. Robinson
title: Suunto Ambit3 Sport Sapphire Watch
text:
Photo: Suunto print_article_embed|photo-8359286|article-6429704|7 comments_jump_embed|photo-8359286|article-6429704|1 email_share_embed|photo-8359286|article-6429704|1 facebook_share_embed|photo-8359286|article-6429704|2 twitter_share_embed|photo-8359286|article-6429704|3 pinterest_share_embed|photo-8359286|article-6429704|4 reddit_share_embed|photo-8359286|article-6429704|5 google_share_embed|photo-8359286|article-6429704|6 Suunto Ambit3 Sport Sapphire Watch Suunto Ambit3 Sport Sapphire Watch
It seems as if nearly everyone has an activity tracker on his or her wrist. But when you’re adventure minded, and especially if you’re curious about every element of your adventures, the Suunto Ambit3 Sport Sapphire watch blows those trackers out of the water. The multisport/GPS watch displays time, date, barometric overview, altimeter, compass, stopwatch, countdown timer and activity tracker. The Ambit3 can also connect with your smartphone or tablet via Bluetooth to Movescount, Suunto’s online community, where you can share data or keep it to yourself. To top it off, an iPhone app enables users to create videos of their route by integrating data from the Ambit 3 with photos taken with their phone. Suunto Ambit3 Sport Sapphire Watch Suunto Ambit3 Sport Sapphire Watch
It seems as if nearly everyone has an activity tracker on his or her wrist. But when you’re adventure minded, and especially if you’re curious about every element of your adventures, the Suunto Ambit3 Sport Sapphire watch blows those trackers out of the water. The multisport/GPS watch displays time, date, barometric overview, altimeter, compass, stopwatch, countdown timer and activity tracker. The Ambit3 can also connect with your smartphone or tablet via Bluetooth to Movescount, Suunto’s online community, where you can share data or keep it to yourself. To top it off, an iPhone app enables users to create videos of their route by integrating data from the Ambit 3 with photos taken with their phone.
